title: Interactive English Education Model for Non-English-Speaking Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English grammar and vocabulary comprehension
context.additional_context: Utilization of smartphone-based supplementary learning tools, emphasis on project-based assessment and group activities

learning_goals: Learners can fluently engage in English conversations of five or more sentences in daily life and job-related contexts.
Learners can perform English Q&A with over 80% accuracy while maintaining contextual coherence using an AI-based conversation model.
Learners can present English communication strategies applicable to real-world work scenarios through project-based assessment.

resources: Smartphone/tablet for interactive AI model access
Whiteboard and markers for group activities
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
